### onSelect

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(handler: <a href='/docs/next/api-reference/commandkit/types/command-kit-select-menu-builder-interaction-collector-dispatch#commandkitselectmenubuilderinteractioncollectordispatch'>CommandKitSelectMenuBuilderInteractionCollectorDispatch</a>&#60;       UserSelectMenuInteraction,       <a href='/docs/next/api-reference/commandkit/classes/user-select-menu-kit#userselectmenukit'>UserSelectMenuKit</a>     &#62;, data?: <a href='/docs/next/api-reference/commandkit/types/command-kit-select-menu-builder-interaction-collector-dispatch-context-data#commandkitselectmenubuilderinteractioncollectordispatchcontextdata'>CommandKitSelectMenuBuilderInteractionCollectorDispatchContextData</a>) => this`}   />

Sets the handler to run when the modal is submitted.



*Example*

```ts
const modal = new UserSelectMenuKit()
 .setTitle('My Modal')
 .setCustomId('my-modal')
 .filter((interaction) => interaction.user.id === '1234567890')
 .onSelect(async (interaction) => {
    await interaction.reply('You submitted the modal!');
  })
  .addComponents(actionRow1, actionRow2);
```
